last_action: click on the Chrome app located at the right and lower part of the screen.
reflect_result: By clicking on the Chrome app, you have opened the browser, which is the first step in performing your search for good Indian restaurants. This action moves you closer to your user request, as you now have access to the internet, where you can type in your query and search for restaurant options. The next step would be to enter the search term for Indian restaurants into the browser's search bar.
